name: Ski-Doo: Snowmobile Challenge
overview: Take on a friend in 2-player split-screen racing Compete in Snow Cross, Cross Country, Aerial Freestyle, and Hill Cross events Perform dangerous stunts in mid-air, for big points... if you can land them Ride authentic Ski-Doo snowmobiles using intuitive Wii motion controls Personalize your rider with official Ski-Doo gear
